content: * this pattern is a variation of another pattern i published called the bee kind bag 1 i did not have any testers for this pattern so i appreciate your feedback on this fun vibrant bag free bag pattern * this is designed as a small to medium sized bag- but can easily be elongated by simply adding more rounds to the body keep in mind that due to the contruction of the fabric it will expand more with the weight added to the inside of the bag * due to the open work in the bag gauge is provided but not largely used for this pattern * materials needed hook 5 5 mm us i-9 stitch marker yarn needle optional 1 large button suggested yarn darn good yarn twist worsted weight silk 2 * approximately 3 skeins of this yarn is needed possibly 4 for larger bags 1 https //www ravelry com/stores/theresa-randall-designs/products/1016062/edit 2 https //www darngoodyarn com/blogs/the-darn-good-yarn-graveyard/darn-good-twist-worsted-weight-silk-yarn srsltid=afmbooqbxgmtnele7qli4j8outhrfdeuosm9-dwcpl_0akpd6vosfrkg
